page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER _ Crimes
page.content: CRIMES THAT OCCUR IN ESSENDON {CRIMINAL DAMAGE (VANDALISM)_ usually by children {BURGLARY_ to the larger, more remote houses {THEFT_ usually from farms, ie. chain saws, electrical fencing {STOLEN CARS_ not stolen from our area, but dumped here, Cucumber Lane is the favourite spot {DRUGS_ Cannabis and Heroin {POACHING_ pheasants in the autumn, rabbits all year round (poachers are usually thieves or burglars as well) {FRAUD_ 1.obtaining services by deception. 2.cashing stolen cheques.
